During the data collection, young kindergarten teachers, teachers in 1-4 grades of elementary school, 5-8 grades of elementary school, and teachers teaching in secondary schools who have finished their higher education studies at most 5 years ago, and who teach in schools where the rate of Roma students is over 20%. Both the institutions and the schools were selected based on a previous telephone interview. The supplementary address interviews were done based on this sample. During the sata collection 540 teachers were interviewed.
